One question that I want to ask: what do you guys consider the
smallest vie=
wing screen you need to see to play gladiator?

I was thinking if your char=
acter was in the center, minimally you
would need to see about 10 tiles abo=
ve you, 10 tiles below you, 10
tiles to your left, and 10 tiles to your rig=
ht.  The reason I ask this
is obviously you can't use full screen for a jav=
a applet - You have to
run it inside a web browser.
